name: Money Munchers
overview: Become a millionaire! All it takes is courage and a strong survival instinct. You race through levels of mazes grabbing the money that'll make you rich. Of course, you have some "minor" competition for all that wealth...the mean, money eating Money Munchers plus their nasty little pet Guardians who want to munch YOU! For a million dollars worth of maze fun...and thousands of random mazes...come battle the Money Munchers.
